ch0112_00_hibiki/0101_0701_01_10:
There you are, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I was waiting for you!
ch0112_00_hibiki/0101_0701_02_10:
Every day is a new adventure on Pasio!
Let’s go see what we can find today!
ch0112_00_hibiki/0601_0701_01_10:
Be sure to wear clothes you can move around in
if you’re gonna be adventuring outside!
ch0112_00_hibiki/0601_0701_02_10:
Be it climbing mountains or walking on the beach,
it’s best to be able to move, right?
ch0112_00_hibiki/0601_0701_03_10:
I don’t have too many preferences in my fashion,
but that’s definitely one of the few!
ch0112_00_hibiki/0601_0701_04_10:
Oh, my other one is how I wear my cap
backwards!
ch0112_00_hibiki/0601_0702_01_10:
I have to make sure I never forget my hat when
walking around.
ch0112_00_hibiki/0601_0702_02_10:
It’s an important item that protects me from
strong sunlight and the cold!
ch0112_00_hibiki/0601_0702_03_10:
I gotta take care of myself. I wouldn’t be doing
my Pokémon any favors if I fainted on them!
ch0112_00_hibiki/0602_0701_01_10:
I’m friends with an old couple who run a
Pokémon Day Care!
ch0112_00_hibiki/0602_0701_02_10:
That couple took such good care of my Pokémon
that the Pokémon are really attached to them now.
ch0112_00_hibiki/0602_0701_03_10:
Seeing how they raise Pokémon opened my
eyes to the possibilities of how much closer
people and Pokémon can become!
ch0112_00_hibiki/0602_0702_01_10:
You seem like you have an easy time getting
close with your Pokémon.
ch0112_00_hibiki/0602_0702_02_10:
Is it because you shower them with affection?
If you have a secret to it, let me know sometime!
ch0112_00_hibiki/0603_0701_01_10:
I have a friend named Lyra.
She’s a Pokémon Trainer, too.
ch0112_00_hibiki/0603_0701_02_10:
I grew up with her in New Bark Town.
She’s not only a great rival but also one
of my best friends!
ch0112_00_hibiki/0603_0701_03_10:
She’s got a good head on her shoulders, and she’s
good in a Pokémon battle to boot! If you need
anybody to have your back, she’s your girl!
ch0112_00_hibiki/0603_0702_01_10:
We have to value not only our bonds with our
Pokémon but our bonds with other Trainers, too!
ch0112_00_hibiki/0603_0702_02_10:
I mean, c’mon. It’s kinda great to have
people you can depend on, isn’t it?
ch0112_00_hibiki/0604_0701_01_10:
I was floored the first time I heard that Pasio
is an artificial island!
ch0112_00_hibiki/0604_0701_02_10:
It’s got mountains, beaches, forests... I might go
so far as to say that it’s as beautiful as Johto!
ch0112_00_hibiki/0604_0701_03_10:
There are so many things that you can discover
on Pasio. Even walking around alone is fun.
ch0112_00_hibiki/0604_0701_04_10:
But that’s nothing compared to traveling with
your friends!
ch0112_00_hibiki/0604_0702_01_10:
A lot of my camping buddies and I trade all
sorts of secrets with each other—like what kinds
of Berries are good to eat!
ch0112_00_hibiki/0604_0702_02_10:
If you’re ever interested in camping, let me know!
We should go together sometime!
ch0112_00_hibiki/0605_0701_01_10:
There has been a lot of cool stuff that happened
since I got to Pasio.
ch0112_00_hibiki/0605_0701_02_10:
But I think the best part was how I became friends
with you!
ch0112_00_hibiki/0605_0701_03_10: I feel like I can just talk about anything with you.
ch0112_00_hibiki/0605_0701_04_10: And with you, I could keep exploring forever!
ch0112_00_hibiki/0605_0702_01_10:
If there’s anything on your mind, don’t hesitate
to tell me, all right?
ch0112_00_hibiki/0605_0702_02_10:
We’re friends. I want to help you anytime you
need it!
ch0112_00_hibiki/1701_0701_01_10:
Oh, hey! Perfect timing!
There is something I wanted to give you.
ch0112_00_hibiki/1701_0701_02_10: Here, take this! I’m sure it’ll be useful!
ch0112_00_hibiki/1701_0702_01_10:
Using the right item at the right time can make
exploring and battles even more fun!
ch0112_00_hibiki/1701_0702_02_10:
Use whatever item you can if you find yourself
in a bind!
ch0112_00_hibiki/2501_0701_01_10:
You want to know why I’m with my Pokémon?
Huh... You know, it’s become so matter of fact
that I’ve never actually thought about it.
ch0112_00_hibiki/2501_0701_02_10:
Well, let’s see...
Battles and tournaments are definitely a lot of fun.
But if I were to give a single reason...
ch0112_00_hibiki/2501_0701_03_10:
Because it’s fun to be with them!
You’re the same way, right?
ch0112_00_hibiki/2501_0702_01_10:
I thought it over, and I realized you don’t need
a reason to spend time with your friends or
with Pokémon!
ch0112_00_hibiki/2501_0702_02_10:
We need each other—that’s why we’re together.
It’s as simple as that!
ch0112_00_hibiki/2511_0701_01_10: Sometimes when I’m exploring the island...
ch0112_00_hibiki/2511_0701_02_10: I come across sights that take my breath away!
ch0112_00_hibiki/2511_0701_04_10:
Whenever I see something like that, it doesn’t
matter how tired I am from exploring!
I get full of energy again!
ch0112_00_hibiki/2511_0702_01_10: Seeing all the best views on Pasio...
ch0112_00_hibiki/2511_0702_02_10: That might be a pretty good goal, too!
ch0112_00_hibiki/3001_0701_01_10:
When I decide I wanna do something, I go for it!
Sometimes you just have to dive in!
ch0112_00_hibiki/3002_0701_01_10:
Got my hat, my bangs look good...
All ready to go! Wanna go explore together?
ch0112_00_hibiki/3003_0701_01_10:
*cheerful humming*
When I’m walking and singing, I feel like I can
cross entire mountains!
ch0112_00_hibiki/3004_0701_01_10:
Free and easy, like a leaf blowing in the wind...
That’s my kind of adventure!
ch0112_00_hibiki/3005_0701_01_10:
When you’re working hard, you’ve gotta rest
hard, too! That’s what my mom always says.
ch0112_00_hibiki/3006_0701_01_10:
Ah! I got so distracted! I’d better grab something
to eat before my stomach starts growling.
